plot: The true identity of an undercover RCMP narcotics agent is discovered by the criminals he is investigating and his family pays the price.
title: On n'engraisse pas les cochons à l'eau claire
plot_es: The true identity of an undercover RCMP narcotics agent is discovered by the criminals he is investigating and his family pays the price.
original_name: On n'engraisse pas les cochons à l'eau claire
plot_en: The true identity of an undercover RCMP narcotics agent is discovered by the criminals he is investigating and his family pays the price.
